name: dark-ruby
description:
A dark-background color scheme.

Preview: http://priit.mx.ee/files/dark-ruby.png

NB! It's REALLY alfa release and I'm going to improve it on the way (it might take ages :-). You are welcome to fork and improve it at gitorious.org: http://gitorious.com/vim-color-scheme-dark-ruby
install_details:
Save it to: ~/.vim/colors/
Turn xterm-256 colors on at your ~/.vimrc: set term=xterm-256color

Enamble 256 colors on Ubuntu:
sudo apt-get install ncurses-term

versions.release_notes: Comment color a bit more lighter
